name: Farm Monthly Salary
query:
SELECT 
employee_name as "EMPLOYEE:Data:200",
(SELECT date_of_joining FROM `tabFarm Employee` WHERE employee_name = `tabFarm Salary Slip`.`employee_name`)as "DOJ",
MONTHNAME(posting_date) as "POSTING DATE",
working_days as "WORKING DAYS:Data:100",
payment_days as "PAYMENT DAYS:Data:100",
(working_days-payment_days) as "LOSS OF PAY",
total as "TOTAL:Currency:150",
advance as "ADVANCE:Currency:150",
additional as "ADDITIONAL",
net_total as "NET TOTAL:Currency:150",
remarks as "REMARKS",
name as "REF:Data:2"
FROM `tabFarm Salary Slip`
WHERE docstatus=0 and posting_date=%(posting)s ORDER BY company DESC,DOJ ASC;
